body.p: Louisville, Kentucky merchant. Native of Germany. Married to Louisa Hess. Father of Charles Hess, Lewis Hess, Edward Hess, Louise "Lilly" Hess, Jr., Flora Hess, Albert Hess, and Belle Hess. Peddler in Louisville in 1850. Merchant in Louisville in 1860.
